Description¶

Summary¶

This application is the web site of the Orange County Lettings company. It allows user to see opened lettings.

Technologies¶

The applicaion is developped using the Django python framework.

It can use sqllite or postgresql databases.

It can also use Sentry monitoring.

The following python packages are used :

  • python-dotenv : environment variables setup

  • flake8 : linting

  • pytest : test

  • coverage : tests coverage

  • selenium : functional tests

  • whitenoise : static files handling

  • sentry-sdk : sentry logging

  • gunicorn : web server handling

  • Sphinx : documentation
